name: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
overview: Germany, 1938. Hitler craves his first conquest: Stealing the sacred Holy Grail. It's up to you to get it first - if you can find it. Explore five treacherous levels in a fierce race against time, numerous enemies, rats, and ancient puzzles. Even worse: Jones Sr. is in evil hands. Be fast, smart and steady, and you might have a chance. Blow it... mankind is doomed!
